Name: Foxy Lady
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Best described as a strawberry gin sour, the herbal botanicals in the gin combine well with the sweet strawberry.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2005 by Nicolas Skovgaard at Fox Hotel bar in Copenhagen, Denmark. Nicolas revised this recipe in 2013 to use chamomile tea-infused gin.
Nutrition: One serving of Foxy Lady contains 187 calories
